We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private UltimateOscillator _ultosc;
// In Initialize()
_ultosc = ULTOSC(symbol, period1, period2, period3);

// In OnData()
if (_ultosc.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ULTOSC Is Ready", _ultosc.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ULTOSC Warm Up Period", _ultosc.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ULTOSC Current", _ultosc.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ULTOSC Name", _ultosc.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ULTOSC Samples", _ultosc.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.ultosc = self.ULTOSC(symbol, period1, period2, period3)

# In OnData()
if self.ultosc.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ULTOSC Is Ready", self.ultosc.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ULTOSC Warm Up Period", self.ultosc.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ULTOSC Current", self.ultosc.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ULTOSC Name", self.ultosc.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ULTOSC Samples", self.ultosc.Samples);
